entities.description: Use of hallucinogens in the past 12 months.
Arguments or problems with family or friends caused or made worse by use of hallucinogens in the past 12 months.
Continued use of hallucinogens despite causing arguments or problems with family or friends.
Situations where using hallucinogens increased chances of getting hurt in the past 12 months.
Use of inhalants such as amyl nitrite, ‘poppers,’ nitrous oxide, gasoline, or lighter fluids in the past 12 months.
Spending a great deal of time using inhalants or feeling their effects in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Use of hallucinogens causing or worsening arguments or problems with family or friends.
Continuing to use hallucinogens even though it caused arguments or problems with family or friends.
Use of hallucinogens leading to increased chances of getting hurt.
Specific use of inhalants among different substances.
Spending excessive time using inhalants or feeling their effects due to inhalant use.
